p: S. alata is an indispensable bactericidal and fungicidal natural therapy. However, the justification of antiviral activities is not properly documented. The antiviral efficacy of n-hexane, ethyl acetate, butanol, and aqueous leaf extracts was assessed on dengue virus (DENV) obtained from an infected pregnant woman in Indonesia via focus assay. The extracts significantly inhibited DENV-2 with IC 50 (<10 μg/ml), CC 50 (645.8 μg/ml) and SI (64.5 μg/ml) [ 111].
